channel.title: Download on TAPAAL
channel.description: Recent content in Download on TAPAAL

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog 3.7.1 (2020-11-01): Bug fixes for the 3.7 series Fix in the verifydtapn engine that provided wrong answers for the AF queries New compilation of verifypn engine 3.7.0 (2020-09-20): Refactoring of a a large part of the GUI Support for drawing game nets together with engine suport Addition of lens allowing to project on timed/untimed nets and game/non-game nets Quick drawing of nets when pressing ctrl (in arc-drawing mode) 3.
